entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build fails with longer repo root paths #60812
  • JIT doesn't inline simple callee methods with nullable value types #60810
    7.0.0
  • Build log files referenced by failed native component build do not exist #60809
  • Dev Container: onCreateCommand failed #60807
  • System.Text.Json: [JsonExtensionData] on a property of type JsonObject generates invalid JSON when serializing #60806

Closed

  • The "PInvokeTableGenerator" task failed unexpectedly when using `delegate*` in `[DllImport]` #60802
    6.0.1
  • Some .NET 6 runtime assemblies are not R2R images #60782
  • AES Decryptor gives wrong result in .NET6 compared to .NET Framework #60799

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement System.Array functions used by MD arrays as intrinsics #60816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • IFormatProvider getter refactor #60815
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] PInvokeTableGenerator: Fixup symbol names with invalid chars #60814
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Arm64: fold mov+lsl to ubfiz #60813
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: "Scaled" addressing mode on ARM #60808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Reorganize the creation of the initlocals bblock. #60804
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Merged

  • Integrate changes in shared files from feature/NativeAOT #60811
    area-Meta
  • Optimize PersianCalendar.AddMonths calculations #60778
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • More stack overflow avoidance in regex NonBacktracking #60786
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Add a COMPlus variable to throw runtime exception on JIT asserts #60631
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • [IGNORE][wasm] Split sendtohelixhelp.proj #60793
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix mono_get_generic_context_from_stack_frame when it's from a dim. #60770
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • add unit test for variable length encoding HTTP/3 #60766
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
